official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to make loans for the construction of facilities to produce ethanol for blending with motor fuel.

summary.text: Ethanol Production Incentive Act of 1980 - Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to make loans to eligible persons for the construction of facilities to produce ethanol for blending with motor fuel. Restricts such loans to facilities with an annual production capacity of 15,000,000 gallons of ethanol or less. Terminates such authority two years after funds are first made available. Sets forth requirements and conditions for such loans.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to make loans for the construction of facilities to produce ethanol for blending with motor fuel.
